objective: Plan the frontend development tasks and structure based on architecture and design.

sub_agent.name: component-generator
sub_agent.purpose: Generate frontend component boilerplate with proper structure
sub_agent.use_when: Need to scaffold new React/Vue/Svelte components
sub_agent.note: Use for planning component structure, DEV_FRONTEND will implement details

sub_agent.name: api-client-generator
sub_agent.use_when: Need to plan API integration approach and client structure
sub_agent.note: Use for planning client architecture, DEV_FRONTEND will implement

delegation_guidance.parallel_tasks: Component structure planning and API client architecture can be designed in parallel.
delegation_guidance.sequential_tasks: None - both tasks are independent at the planning stage.
delegation_guidance.handoff: Pass component specifications and API client design to DEV_FRONTEND for implementation.

instructions: 1. Review architecture and UI/UX designs. 2. Use the orchestrator skill to plan frontend work breakdown. 3. Delegate to sub-agents for planning: - component-generator: Define component hierarchy and props interfaces - api-client-generator: Plan API client architecture 4. Run both in parallel as they're independent. 5. Break down UI designs into components. 6. Define state management strategy. 7. Create task specifications for Frontend Developer. 8. Output component breakdown and implementation plan.
